query:
SELECT 
  s.symbol,
  s.name,
  COUNT(t.id) as trade_count,
  SUM(t.pnl) / 100 as total_pnl_dollars,
  SUM(CASE WHEN t.pnl > 0 THEN t.pnl ELSE 0 END) / 100 as gross_profit,
  SUM(CASE WHEN t.pnl < 0 THEN ABS(t.pnl) ELSE 0 END) / 100 as gross_loss,
  SUM(CASE WHEN t.pnl > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as winning_trades,
  SUM(CASE WHEN t.pnl < 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as losing_trades,
  MIN(t.entryDate) as first_trade,
  MAX(t.exitDate) as last_trade
FROM strategies s
LEFT JOIN trades t ON s.id = t.strategyId
WHERE s.symbol = 'ESTrend'
GROUP BY s.id, s.symbol, s.name;

  SUM(CASE WHEN t.pnl < 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as losing_trades,
  MIN(t.entryDate) as first_trade,
  MAX(t.exitDate) as last_trade
FROM strategies s
LEFT JOIN trades t ON s.id = t.strategyId
WHERE s.symbol = 'ESTrend'
